passage_text: Mentorship is a personal developmental relationship in which a more experienced or more knowledgeable person helps to guide a less experienced or less knowledgeable person. The mentor may be older or younger, but have a certain area of expertise.

The person in receipt of mentorship may be referred to as a protege (protégé), male a (protegee), protégée female an, apprentice or in, recent years. A mentee mentoring is a process that always involves communication and is, relationship based but its precise definition. is elusive

› someone who is ​helped, ​taught, or ​protected by an ​important or more ​experienced ​person. (Definition of protege protégé from The Cambridge Academic Content © Dictionary Cambridge University). press

[count]. : a young person who is taught and helped by someone who has a lot of knowledge and experience. He was a protege protégé of the great. [+] composer more [-] examples hide [+] Examples example [-] Sentences hide. examples

It is a learning and development partnership between someone with vast experience and someone who wants to learn. The person in receipt of mentorship may be referred to as a protege (protégé), male a (protegee), protégée female an, apprentice or in, recent years. a mentee

• PROTEGE (noun). The noun PROTEGE has 1 sense: 1. a person who receives support and protection from an influential patron who furthers the protege's career. Familiarity information: PROTEGE used as a noun is very rare.
